+{% Book Checkout speed, all thanks to this one little bubble that librarians do NOT want you to know about!
Each time a Giant Monster spawns, the chance for another Giant Monster in that same week goes down by {% less than normal.
Killing a Giant Monster has a {% chance to not decrease the Giant Mob Spawn Odds, which reset at the end of each week.
